text: Deno is a JavaScript and TypeScript runtime. It uses the V8 JavaScript engine and Rust. Deno was announced in 2018 by Ryan Dahl, the creator of Node.js in his talk, "10 Things I Regret About Node.js". Deno 1.0 was released on May 13, 2020. ==References== Category:Free software Category:Linux software Category:Microsoft Windows software Category:JavaScript
title: Deno (software)
